Instruction: Prepare a baking sheet by lining it with parchment paper.
Bring a large pot of water with a light sprinkle of salt to a boil. Add the pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until it reaches al dente; then drain.

In a medium skillet over medium heat, melt butter with salt and cook until it is just browned. Remove from heat and combine with pasta, cheese, and oregano. Transfer the mixture to a 7x11 inch baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes, or until it is hot and bubbling.
